title: Stylish Sapporo Susukino City Break Near Odori Park
description: Located at the heart of Sapporo’s vivacious entertainment district, ANA Holiday Inn Sapporo Susukino, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect base to explore Hokkaido’s beguiling capital. Just a five-minute walk from the iconic flower gardens of Odori Park - site of the world-famous Sapporo Snow festival - and a plethora of nightclubs, bars and izakayas, return after days spent in snow or sunshine to laidback Japanese favourites at All Day Dining Verve.
location_description: ANA Holiday Inn Sapporo Susukino, an IHG Hotel
